Server.Convert

Class AbbotConvert

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Server.Convert.AbbotConvert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AbbotConvert
extends java.lang.Thread
    Manages all operations needed for a conversion of an input file to an output file using a schema file, correcting for specific known errors produced by Abbot in the output files, and then performing validation checks. Requires the most recent abbot jar file. See https://github.com/CDRH/abbot
    Version:
    0.8, 12/15/2012
    Author:
    Frank Smutniak, Center for Digital Research in the Humanities, http://cdrh.unl.edu
